privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Pixel Logistics, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We collect information that you provide to us directly when using our services, including name, contact information, and shipping details. We use this information to provide our logistics services efficiently and improve your experience with us.

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, process your requests, communicate with you about our services, and enhance the security of our platform. We will not share your personal information with third parties except with your consent or as required by law.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We take appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use SSL encryption and advanced security systems to protect your data. However, no data transmission over the Internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to the processing of your data or request its restriction. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at the email address listed below.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our website, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at: info@pixelogistics.com

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: Welcome to Pixel Logistics. By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.

services.title: Services
services.content: We provide comprehensive logistics services including international freight, warehousing, local distribution, customs clearance, and e-commerce solutions. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any of our services at any time without prior notice.

responsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: You are responsible for providing accurate and complete information about your shipments, including content, value, and destination. You must comply with all local and international laws and regulations regarding shipping and customs. You are responsible for ensuring that all shipped goods are legal and do not violate any intellectual property rights.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Our liability is subject to applicable laws and regulations in Saudi Arabia. We are not responsible for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services. Our maximum liability is limited to the value of the service provided or the agreed insurance amount, whichever is lower.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.content: We strongly recommend insurance for all shipments. We can arrange insurance on your behalf for an additional fee. In the absence of insurance, our liability is limited according to the carrier's standard terms.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: All fees and charges must be paid on time according to the invoice terms. We reserve the right to hold shipments until full payment is received. Late payment fees may apply to overdue payments.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Saudi Arabia. Any disputes arising from these terms or our services will be resolved through arbitration in Riyadh in accordance with the applicable arbitration rules in the Kingdom.

changes.title: Amendments
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will post any changes on this page and update the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after any amendments means you accept the modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions about these terms, please contact us at: info@pixelogistics.com
